price: (52) And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
